hero.title: Building the future with design and software
hero.subtitle: Creating efficient digital solutions.
hero.description: I transform ideas into useful and attractive digital experiences. Through design and programming, I seek to create solutions that simplify people's lives.

items.title: My Passion: Software and Design
items.content: I've always been fascinated by how technology and design come together to create solutions. My goal is to transform complex ideas into simple and functional digital products. My main focus is modern web development, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS for fast and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.

items.title: What I Am: Engineer in Training
items.content: Currently, I'm in the process of becoming a Software Engineer, which has provided me with a solid foundation in data structures, algorithms, and back-end development. I combine this rigorous logic with my eye for design (UI/UX) to deliver complete, high-quality solutions.

items.title: My Professional Aspirations
items.content: I seek to work on challenging projects where I can apply my knowledge in AI, full-stack development, and design. I'm especially motivated by innovation and creating products that have a positive impact on users and the digital environment.

items.title: DigiHealth – Clinical Management System
items.description: Complete platform for hospital management, covering everything from biometric patient registration to medical inventory and appointment management. Design focused on professional UI/UX.

items.title: Interactive Tourism Landing Page
items.description: Responsive and animated landing page design for a travel agency, using fluid animations and modern design. Excellent performance thanks to Next.js.

items.title: 3D Shooter - Unity Game
items.description: Development of a 3D First-Person Shooter (FPS) video game prototype. Application of game logic, physics, and advanced scripting.
